Title: A Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Tsuguo Mogami
Plot: Eren begins his training with the Cadet Corps, but questions about his painful past overwhelm him. When he struggles with a maneuvering exercise, Berholt and Reiner offer kindly advice.
